page.title: 14 Being a Guide
page.content:
I go to 2nd Chalgrove Guides and its on Friday,7p.m. till 9p.m. and I've been on camps as well.On thinking day (February 22nd) the day the guides started and Lady Baden Powell made up the idea.Because Lord Baden Powell made up cubs and scouts,Lady Baden Powell made up brownies and guides. The initials B.P.stand for BE PREPARED and Baden Powell;you can start brownies at 7 until you are 10.In guides you have to make bedding rolls and pitch tents and cook and you do badges and games.I have 10 badges and I am in Thistle Patrol and there's Bluebells,Snowdrops,Orchids and Forget Me Nots as well.
by Sharon Smith.
